com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec

Interface CloseMsg

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Msg, XMLDecoder

    public interface CloseMsg
extends Msg
    UPA close message is used by a Consumer to indicate no further interest in a stream. The stream should be closed as a result. The streamId indicates the item stream to which CloseMsg applies.
    See Also:
    Msg, CloseMsgFlags

    • Method Summary
